headline.main: Gas Blast Kills 4 in Mexico City Suburb Famous for Fireworks
headline.print_headline: Gas Blast Kills 4 in Mexico City Suburb Famous for Fireworks

lead_paragraph: An explosion has killed four people at a home in a Mexico City suburb where a massive fireworks market blast left dozens dead in December.
snippet: An explosion has killed four people at a home in a Mexico City suburb where a massive fireworks market blast left dozens dead in December....
